category.name: Column Preferences
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Mfg0MEPlantBOPRevisionShownColumnWidthsPref
preference.preference_description: Specifies the width of the columns displayed in the base view of the plant BOP. This setting affects each column defined in the Mfg0MEPlantBOPRevisionColumnsShownPref preference. Valid Values: Accepts a list of integers that define the number of characters permitted in each column. There should be one value for each column defined in the Mfg0MEPlantBOPRevisionColumnsShownPref preference, and the values are applied in the same order (that is, the first value in this preference is applied to the first column in the Mfg0MEPlantBOPRevisionColumnsShownPref, and so on).
